description: Housed in a futuristic building, La Porta Restaurant is a multi - purpose establishment which offers a bar for aperitifs and a highly modern cigar room, as well as a well - stocked wine cellar offering the best wines from Italy and elsewhere. The cuisine is creative with a particular focus on fish recipes, while lighter options are available in the Café from 7. 30am to 7pm.
